author: akapoorcern
body:
Changes expected after the pull request are explained in this presentation: 
[FullSimVsFastSim_IterationComparison_Debugging_Tracking_POG_Meeting_18Jan16.pdf](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/files/106197/FullSimVsFastSim_IterationComparison_Debugging_Tracking_POG_Meeting_18Jan16.pdf)
Hit pair check for seed implemented.
title: Hit pair implementation
